articles.title: Official One UI 7.0 introduces Galaxy Weather with UI tweaks, smarter widgets [Gallery] - Sammy Fans
articles.description: Right ahead of the official One UI 7.0 rollout, Samsung revealed the brand-new Galaxy Weather app with user interface tweaks and smarter widgets. Announced by the weather team, these changes debuted with the Galaxy S25 series and are now set to expand to olde…

articles.title: Blackmagic PYXIS 12K Camera Explained in Video Interview - CineD
articles.description: Blackmagic PYXIS 12K camera features a full-frame 12K RGBW sensor with the original camera body of the PYXIS 6K for $6,595.

articles.title: Vivo X200 Ultra: Massive 35mm Zeiss camera appears in leaked hands-on video - Notebookcheck
articles.description: For the first time, a hands-on video of the Vivo X200 Ultra has leaked on Chinese social media, which we consider quite authentic at first glance. It confirms many hints from the past few days, such as the shutter button on the side and the corresponding Zeis…

articles.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles 2 character trailers - Gyokko, Hantengu - Gematsu
articles.description: Publisher Aniplex and developer CyberConnect2 have released two new characters trailers for Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Hinokami Chronicles 2, introducing Gyokko and Hantengu.
